org.apache.zookeeper

Interface ClientWatchManager


  • public interface ClientWatchManager

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Watcher> materialize(Watcher.Event.KeeperState state, Watcher.Event.EventType type, java.lang.String path)
      Return a set of watchers that should be notified of the event.

    • Method Detail

      • materialize

        java.util.Set<Watcher> materialize(Watcher.Event.KeeperState state,
                                 Watcher.Event.EventType type,
                                 java.lang.String path)
        Return a set of watchers that should be notified of the event. The manager must not notify the watcher(s), however it will update it's internal structure as if the watches had triggered. The intent being that the callee is now responsible for notifying the watchers of the event, possibly at some later time.
        Parameters:
        state - event state
        type - event type
        path - event path
        Returns:
        may be empty set but must not be null
